name: DaveAnimaBasics REMAKE
description:
UPTADE:

STORY MENU FIXED

DOGAO HIT BOX FIXED

DAVEANIMA IS BACK WITH AN AMAZING AND BIG REMAKE!

#baldi #baldibasics #baldisbasics #baldi_mod #baldimod

#mod #fangame #horror #action #adventure #retro

STORY:

Today an intern went to teach while Dave evaluates his class, Dave wants to show that his class is great!

DON'T PUT EVERYTHING TO LOSE!

Controls:

WASD - WALK

SHIFT - RUN

MOUSE - LOOK

SPACE - LOOK BEHIND

LEFTCLICK - OPEN DOOR AND PICK UP ITEMS

RIGHTCLICK - USE ITEMS

F - USE FLASHLIGHT (IN THE FARM)

ESC - PAUSE GAME

WHATS NEW?

-NEW MODES

-NEW SPRITES

-NEW AREAS

-NEW MAPS

-NEW ITEMS

-NEW CHARACTERS

(CREDITS IN THE GAME)
